channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: En promo à moins de 650 €, mieux vaut s’équiper du Google Pixel 10 ou du Nothing Phone (3) pour bien commencer 2026 ?
item.description: Les smartphones vont voir leurs prix augmenter en 2026. Mieux vaut donc profiter des modèles phares de 2025 déjà en forte baisse, comme le Nothing Phone (3) et le Google Pixel 10, deux smartphones premium actuellement sous les 650 euros et capables d’offrir une vraie expérience haut de gamme sans faire exploser le budget.

item.title: How to watch the NVIDIA CES 2026 presentation live
item.description: CFOTO via Getty Images During CES 2025, we watched NVIDIA tout its leading position in the artificial intelligence arena for the bulk of the presentation. But it did reveal some new hardware, including its RTX 5000-series GPUs and Project Digits desktop supercomputer (later redubbed Spark). This year, the company's website says it's "lighting up CES 2026 with the power of AI." To that end, NVIDIA is pulling out all the stops at its Vegas installation, promising hands-on demos in its booth at the Fontainebleau, replete with the "latest NVIDIA solutions driving innovation and productivity across...

item.title: I review EVs for a living – these are the top 7 electric cars that blew me away in 2025
item.description: Looking to add an EV to your life in 2026? These are the best electric cars that I have driven this year.

item.title: 'Your data is not going to leave the US' – iRobot CEO reassures Roomba owners following takeover by Chinese company
item.description: Exclusive: CEO responds to iRobot co-founder's suggestion that Roomba data would be transferred to China.

item.title: In 2025, quitting social media felt easier than ever
item.description: For a tech writer, being very offline is sort of like being a marathon coach who doesn’t run. So in 2025, I tried to reverse years of studied avoidance towards the most ubiquitous technological phenomenon on earth — I got back on social media. The change was short-lived. My first exodus from the feeds took some work — disabling notifications, removing apps from my homescreen and then deleting accounts entirely. This time, the phone put itself down. The whole thing has simply lost its luster.I started with Instagram. Every experience went like this: I’d see a single post from one of the rare f...

item.title: Vers Mars et au-delà : comment l’IA est en train de réinventer la propulsion des fusées
item.description: Chaque année, des entreprises et des agences spatiales lancent des centaines de fusées dans l'espace, et ce nombre devrait croître considérablement avec les missions ambitieuses vers la Lune, Mars et au-delà. Mais ces rêves reposent sur un défi crucial : la propulsion, c'est-à-dire les méthodes...

item.title: Argos launches a huge January sale – get up to 50% off tech, appliances, toys, and more
item.description: There are discounts of up to 50% on tech, toys, appliances, and more in the Argos January sale – and I've picked out the top 10 deals for you right here.

item.title: DJI's first 360-degree drone could be flying in soon, with these bundles available to buyers
item.description: You'll be able to get the DJI Avata 360 with a variety of accessories, when it finally sees the light of day.

item.title: Fizz social app’s CEO on why anon works
item.description: Fizz is betting that Gen Z is tired of performing their lives on Instagram and TikTok. What started as a pandemic-era group chat frustration has turned into the dominant social platform on college campuses across the US, focused on the 99% of life that doesn’t make it into a highlight reel. Capturing the attention of a demographic typically glued […]...

item.title: On est monté dans la voiture électrique la moins chère au monde en Chine : la Wuling Binguo EV
item.description: Dans un marché automobile chinois en pleine effervescence électrique, SAIC-GM-Wuling dévoile la version facelift 2025 de sa Binguo EV, une citadine électrique qui entend démocratiser la mobilité zéro émission avec un positionnement tarifaire particulièrement agressif. On a pu la voir. Voici notre premier avis.

item.title: FYI: These Are the Asteroids You Should Mine
item.description: Scientists have analyzed a collection of meteorites to figure out where asteroid prospectors should go first.

item.title: How to watch the Bosch CES 2026 press conference live
item.description: You may know Bosch as a home appliance brand (via its partnership with Siemens), but the German multinational is generally more focused on providing underlying technology and engineering solutions to auto, home and manufacturing partners across the globe. It's fitting, then, that much of what it's showing off at CES 2026 is more intended to be licensed to other companies versus Bosch-branded products you'll be seeing on store shelves. Case in point is Bosch's automotive plans at CES. The company will present "AI in the car," or more specifically, in the cockpit of the car. "Bosch's AI-powered ...

item.title: Will the Samsung Galaxy S25’s price drop when the S26 launches?
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 series is likely almost here, which could mean price drops for the Galaxy S25 line, but will that happen? And how much by?

item.title: These are the gaming resolutions that we're bringing into 2026

item.title: Should we all be using VPN browsers?
item.description: A New Year's cyber-resolution worth making?

item.title: The best gear to help you stick to your New Year's resolutions
item.description:
The start of a new year always feels like a reset button. Everyone’s talking about moving more, eating better, sleeping longer or finally taming their digital chaos. But resolutions rarely survive on willpower alone. The right tools or piece of tech can make those goals easier to keep by turning motivation into a habit. Whether you’re trying to close your rings, track your progress or just build better routines, these smart picks make self-improvement feel a little more achievable, and a lot more enjoyable. Gear that can help you stick to your New Year's resolutions
...

item.title: The Mighty Nein cast draft their ultimate Critical Role squad
item.description: In a battle royale of Critical Role PCs, who would come out on top? The cast draft their ultimate teams to find out for sure.

item.title: Intel in 2025: Year in review
item.description: Intel made something of a recovery this year, as Team Blue cut some huge and vital deals under new CEO Lip-Bu Tan.

item.title: Une « Super Lune » et une pluie d'étoiles filantes simultanées à ne pas manquer
item.description: 2026 démarre de manière spectaculaire dans le ciel : deux événements astronomiques vont se produire simultanément, entre vendredi et samedi.

item.title: Voilà comment bien commencer l’année en 4K QD-OLED à 240 Hz avec l’Asus Rog Swift qui perd 500 € de son prix
item.description: L’Asus ROG Swift PG32UCDM, c’est un écran OLED de 31,5 pouces qui pousse le vice jusqu’à 240 Hz. C'est un peu une frappe visuelle qui redéfinit la manière de jouer sur PC. Et comme si ça ne suffisait pas, son prix lâche la pression : de 1 399 € à 889 € sur Son-Vidéo.com.

item.title: 4 Best Smart Scales (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: If you’re ready to start tracking your weight, BMI, and other health data on your phone, we’ve weighed in on some great options.

item.title: A fresh Samsung Galaxy S26 leak points to a launch date — and brings good news on pricing
item.description: While the Galaxy S26 phones might be launching later in the year, it sounds as though they won't cost any more.

item.title: Aides auto 2026 : bonus, leasing, CEE… voici tout ce qui change pour votre budget depuis le 1er janvier
item.description: L'argent magique, c'est fini. En ce 1er janvier 2026, les règles du jeu pour acheter une voiture électrique changent radicalement. Le score environnemental fait toujours le tri, mais les montants fondent et les conditions se durcissent. On fait le point pour vous éviter de perdre 1 000 ou 2 000 euros bêtement.
